title: So is Lucian going to stay garbo next season?
body: I just want to know if Riot is going to keep pretending a "caster ADC" that has to be within every skill in the game to do any significant contribution to his team is going to be worth anything or if they are going to admit that gutting his auto range so he cant lane against anyone but Ez and Corki (hey look at that these two aren't looked as that great either) was a bad move.
